name: HTMLProgressElement
description: The HTMLProgressElement interface provides special properties and methods (beyond the regular HTMLElement interface it also has available to it by inheritance) for manipulating the layout and presentation of <progress> elements.

refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLProgressElement' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
